name: "Domaine Bousquet Malbec"
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (domainebousquet.com) Organic Argentine Malbec from Domaine Bousquet in Mendoza. Certified organic, sustainably grown at high altitude. Great value introduction to Argentine Malbec!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Malbec | Ripe plum, blackberry & smooth tannins | Fruit-forward, approachable | Crowd-pleasing style.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Grilled meats, empanadas, BBQ, chimichurri steak.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect everyday Argentine wine. Organic quality at great value!

name: Advice from John Merlot
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (orinswift.com) Rich California Merlot from cult producer Orin Swift. Same winemaker as Abstract and Machete. Premium quality at accessible price!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Merlot | Plum, black cherry & chocolate | Smooth tannins | Approachable Orin Swift style.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Grilled meats, duck, pork, pasta, Italian dishes.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Premium Orin Swift quality. Great value from this renowned producer!

name: Felino Malbec
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (paulhobbs.com) Premium Mendoza Malbec from renowned winemaker Paul Hobbs. Rated 93 pts by James Suckling! Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Malbec | Rich, concentrated dark fruit, chocolate & spice | Velvety texture | High-altitude balance.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Ribeye, lamb, BBQ, Argentine steak.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: High-quality Argentine Malbec from a legendary winemaker. Available by the glass too!

name: Stags' Leap Merlot
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (stagsleap.com) Elegant Napa Merlot from legendary Stags' Leap estate in the famous Stags Leap District. Softer, more approachable than Cabernet. Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Merlot | Plum, black cherry, chocolate | Smooth tannins | Premium Napa elegance.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Duck, pork, mushroom dishes, softer cheeses.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Premium Napa Merlot from an iconic producer. Perfect for those who prefer softer reds!

name: Red Schooner Malbec by Caymus
serverNotes:
üö¢ ABOUT: (caymus.com) Unique collaboration! Argentine Malbec finished in Caymus' Napa facility. Caymus style meets Argentine fruit. Conversation starter! Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Malbec | Rich, bold dark fruit | Smooth tannins | Innovative Argentina-Napa fusion.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Steaks, BBQ, bold dishes, Argentine cuisine.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Innovative wine from legendary Caymus. Unique story for wine enthusiasts!

name: Grgich Merlot
serverNotes:
üèÜ ABOUT: (grgich.com) Premium Napa Merlot from legendary Grgich Hills Estate (est. 1977). From the winemaker who put California on the map with the 1976 Judgment of Paris!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Merlot | Plum, leather & earth | Integrated tannins | Well-aged, ready now | Sophisticated elegance.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Duck, pork, truffle dishes, aged cheese.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 30-60 minutes to soften tannins and enhance complexity.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Iconic producer, sophisticated Merlot. Wine history in every glass!

name: Duckhorn Merlot
serverNotes:
üèÜ ABOUT: (duckhorn.com) Legendary Napa Merlot rated 90 pts by Wine Enthusiast! Duckhorn made Merlot fashionable in America. Benchmark producer since 1978.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Merlot | Rich, velvety with plum, chocolate & spice | Consistently excellent | Premier American Merlot.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Duck, pork, mushrooms, softer dishes.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 30-60 minutes to soften tannins and enhance complexity.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: THE benchmark American Merlot. Duckhorn is synonymous with quality Merlot!
